CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Borealis Graduate School relative to Silverhaven Polytechnic?
SRP.A: Borealis Graduate School is {below} Silverhaven Polytechnic in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Celestial College relative to Aethelgard School of Arts?
SRP.A: Celestial College is {above} Aethelgard School of Arts in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Institute of Technology relative to Aethelgard School of Arts?
SRP.A: Zenith Institute of Technology is {below} Aethelgard School of Arts in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total graduation rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aethelgard School of Arts}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total graduation rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Zenith Institute of Technology}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Meridian Academy's maximum Graduation Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Meridian Academy's maximum Graduation Rate is in {1953}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Borealis Graduate School's maximum Graduation Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Borealis Graduate School's maximum Graduation Rate is in {1957}.

NC.Q: Between 1959 and 1968, did the total Graduation Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1971 and 1975?
NC.A: The change in total graduation rate between 1959 and 1968 was {larger} than between 1971 and 1975.

NC.Q: Was the total Graduation Rate in 1963 higher or lower than in 1974?
NC.A: The total graduation rate in 1963 was {higher} than in 1974.

NC.Q: Was the total Graduation Rate in 1975 higher or lower than in 1977?
NC.A: The total graduation rate in 1975 was {higher} than in 1977.

NC.Q: Between 1961 and 1974, was the average total Graduation Rate higher or lower than between 1958 and 1971?
NC.A: The average total graduation rate between 1961 and 1974 was {lower} than between 1958 and 1971.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Borealis Graduate School} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Celestial College and Meridian Academy first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Celestial College and Meridian Academy first exchanged leading positions in {1954}.
